Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the soundtrack of *Lucky: No Time for Love*?
Options:
A. a) Adnan Sami composed the soundtrack for *Lucky: No Time for Love*.
B. b) The soundtrack album was released in 2005.
C. c) Adnan Sami is known for his work on various soundtrack albums.
D. d) The movie *Lucky: No Time for Love* does not have a soundtrack.
Answer: a) Adnan Sami composed the soundtrack for *Lucky: No Time for Love*.
